verses.text: \w At|strong="H4428"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w time|strong="H6256"\w* \w Merodach-baladan|strong="H4757"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Baladan|strong="H1081"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Babylon \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w letters|strong="H5612"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w gift|strong="H4503"\w* \w to|strong="H7971"\w* \w Hezekiah|strong="H2396"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w had|strong="H4428"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \w about|strong="H8085"\w* \w Hezekiah|strong="H2396"\w*’s illness \w and|strong="H1121"\w* recovery.

\w And|strong="H3701"\w* \w Hezekiah|strong="H2396"\w* \w welcomed|strong="H8055"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* envoys \w gladly|strong="H8055"\w* \w and|strong="H3701"\w* \w showed|strong="H7200"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w what|strong="H1697"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w treasure|strong="H5238"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*—\w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w silver|strong="H3701"\w*, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w spices|strong="H1314"\w*, \w and|strong="H3701"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w precious|strong="H2896"\w* \w oil|strong="H8081"\w*, \w as|strong="H1697"\w* \w well|strong="H2896"\w* \w as|strong="H1697"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w entire|strong="H3605"\w* \w armory|strong="H1004"\w*—\w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H7200"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w found|strong="H4672"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* storehouses. \w There|strong="H1961"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w nothing|strong="H3808"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w palace|strong="H1004"\w* \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w dominion|strong="H4475"\w* \w that|strong="H7200"\w* \w Hezekiah|strong="H2396"\w* \w did|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w show|strong="H7200"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3470"\w* \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w* \w Isaiah|strong="H3470"\w* \w went|strong="H4428"\w* \w to|strong="H4428"\w* \w King|strong="H4428"\w* \w Hezekiah|strong="H2396"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w asked|strong="H4100"\w*, “\w Where|strong="H4100"\w* \w did|strong="H4100"\w* those men \w come|strong="H7350"\w* \w from|strong="H7350"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w what|strong="H4100"\w* \w did|strong="H4100"\w* \w they|strong="H4100"\w* say \w to|strong="H4428"\w* \w you|strong="H4100"\w*?” “\w They|strong="H4100"\w* \w came|strong="H4428"\w* \w to|strong="H4428"\w* \w me|strong="H4100"\w* \w from|strong="H7350"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w distant|strong="H7350"\w* land,” \w Hezekiah|strong="H2396"\w* replied, “\w from|strong="H7350"\w* Babylon.”

“\w What|strong="H4100"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w seen|strong="H7200"\w* \w in|strong="H1004"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* \w palace|strong="H1004"\w*?” Isaiah \w asked|strong="H4100"\w*. “\w They|strong="H3808"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w seen|strong="H7200"\w* \w everything|strong="H3605"\w* \w in|strong="H1004"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w palace|strong="H1004"\w*,” \w answered|strong="H1697"\w* \w Hezekiah|strong="H2396"\w*. “\w There|strong="H1961"\w* \w is|strong="H4100"\w* \w nothing|strong="H3808"\w* \w among|strong="H7200"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* treasures \w that|strong="H7200"\w* \w I|strong="H1697"\w* \w did|strong="H4100"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w show|strong="H7200"\w* \w them|strong="H7200"\w*.”

\w Then|strong="H8085"\w* \w Isaiah|strong="H3470"\w* \w said|strong="H1697"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w Hezekiah|strong="H2396"\w*, “\w Hear|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Hosts|strong="H6635"\w*:

\w The|strong="H3605"\w* \w time|strong="H3117"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w surely|strong="H2009"\w* come \w when|strong="H3117"\w* \w everything|strong="H3605"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w palace|strong="H1004"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* fathers \w have|strong="H3068"\w* stored \w up|strong="H5375"\w* \w until|strong="H5704"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w carried|strong="H5375"\w* \w off|strong="H5375"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* Babylon. \w Nothing|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w left|strong="H3498"\w*, \w says|strong="H1697"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w some|strong="H4480"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w your|strong="H3947"\w* \w descendants|strong="H1121"\w*, \w your|strong="H3947"\w* \w own|strong="H1961"\w* flesh \w and|strong="H1121"\w* blood, \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w taken|strong="H3947"\w* \w away|strong="H3947"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w eunuchs|strong="H5631"\w* \w in|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w palace|strong="H1964"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Babylon.”

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w Hezekiah|strong="H2396"\w* \w said|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w Isaiah|strong="H3470"\w*, “\w The|strong="H3588"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w good|strong="H2896"\w*.” \w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w thought|strong="H1697"\w*, “\w At|strong="H3068"\w* least \w there|strong="H1961"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w peace|strong="H7965"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w security|strong="H7965"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w lifetime|strong="H3117"\w*.”
